explanation: [0-0] The video starts in front of an escalator, with white floor tiles visible around it. The escalator has a silver frame and black handrails. In the middle above the video, there is a caption: "Real√or FAKE? ×". In the lower left corner is the "@scottsrealit" logo.

[0-3] A hand wearing a silver ring and a silver bracelet enters the video holding a wet wipe. It places the wipe on the black handrail of the escalator and wipes it upwards forcefully. Turning the wipe over, you can see black stains on it.
